issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

relatedNodes.html: Send in comments and questions to: Truth-Sleuth@TruthOfFables.net.

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.23:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0000ee, surrounding text: #000000)

relatedNodes.html: Send in comments and questions to: Truth-Sleuth@TruthOfFables.net.

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.23:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0000ee, surrounding text: #000000)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (6.7px by 13.5px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 18.2px instead of at least 24px.
